nodes.text: The San Tekka compound was an estate owned by Marlowe and Vellis San Tekka in the Lake Country of the Mid Rim planet Naboo during the High Republic Era. It was near the island of Varykino, which housed an artists' retreat at the time. While investigating the cause of the Emergences which plagued the Outer Rim Territories in the wake of the Great Hyperspace Disaster, Jedi Master Avar Kriss and Jedi Knight Elzar Mann visited the San Tekkas at the compound.
